thread.title: Eleven Afghan children killed in bomb attack on foreign troops - official

title: Eleven Afghan children killed in bomb attack on foreign troops - official
text:
April 30, 2018 / 9:22 AM / Updated 10 hours ago Eleven Afghan children killed in bomb attack on foreign troops - official Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
KABUL (Reuters) - Eleven Afghan children were killed and 16 wounded on Monday when a car bomb targeting foreign military forces exploded in the southern city of Kandahar, a senior provincial officer said.
The bomb attack came hours after twin blasts in the capital, Kabul, killed at least 25 people, including eight journalists. Reporting by Mohammad Stanekzai, Writing by Rupam Jain, Editing by
